title: ndl_tei
text:
Install latest from the GitHub repository:
$ pip install git+https://github.com/nakamura196/ndl_tei.git



Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub repository’s pages.

title: ndl_tei
text:
How to use

from ndl_tei.core import Client


ndl_xml_path = "./ndl.xml"
output_path = "./ndl.tei.xml"

title = "Sample"

client = Client(ndl_xml_path, title, output_path)
client.convert()

title: core
text:
source

Client

 Client (ndl_xml_path:str, title:str, output_path:str,
         manifest_path:str=None)

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

source


Client.convert
